content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you, Max. I appreciate you coming to see my apartment. It is a lovely 25 square meter apartment located in a great area of the city. I am very interested in renting it out for the highest possible price, and I believe that you could be a great tenant for it. What rental price do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am interested in the apartment for the lowest price possible. Can you give me a starting point?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Of course, Max. I understand that you are looking for a lower rental price. In that case, I would suggest a starting price of 1,500 Euros per month. This is a fair price given the location and the size of the apartment. However, I am open to negotiating and finding a price that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1,500 Euros per month. Thank you for your offer.

TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for accepting my offer, Max. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement. I will send you a lease agreement and instructions on how to pay the first month's rent. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
